sourcesContent:
<template>
  <VueWaypoint
    v-for="i in testSize"
    :key="i"
    @change="printCallback"
    #default="{ going, direction }">
    <v-container class="presentation-carousel">
      <v-btn @click="toggleDrawer" class="align-self-center">
        HHHHH
      </v-btn>
      <transition
        appear
        name="slide-fade"
        v-on:before-enter="beforeEnter"
        v-on:enter="enter"
        v-on:leave="leave"
        css>
        <v-card v-if="drawer"
          class="elevation-24 rounded-xl presentation-carousel__wrapper"
        >
          <v-carousel
            continuous
            cycle
            interval="5000"
            hide-delimiter-background
            delimiter-icon="mdi-guitar-pick"
            show-arrows-on-hover
            class="rounded-xl presentation-carousel__slider"
            :height="appbarHeight"
          >
            <v-carousel-item
              class="rounded-xl"
              v-for="(slide, i) in presentationCarouselSlides"
              :key="i"
              :src="`${API_URL}/images/${page}/${component}/${slide}`"
            >
            </v-carousel-item>
          </v-carousel>
        </v-card>
      </transition>
    </v-container>
  </VueWaypoint>
</template>

<script>
import velocityMixin from "@/mixins/velocityMixin";
import getPicturesGroupByNames from "@/http/api/picture";
import {VueWaypoint} from "vue-waypoint";

export default {
  name: "TheIndexViewCarousel",
  components: {VueWaypoint},
  data: () => ({
    drawer: true,
    presentationCarouselSlides: [],
    page: "index_page",
    component: "index_carousel",
  }),
  created() {
    this.API_URL = process.env.VUE_APP_API_URL;
    getPicturesGroupByNames(this.page, this.component).then((data) => this.presentationCarouselSlides = data);
  },
  methods: {
    toggleDrawer: function () { this.drawer = !this.drawer },
  },
  setup() {
    function printCallback(waypointState) {
      console.info({
        el: waypointState.el,
        going: waypointState.going,
        direction: waypointState.direction,
      });
    }
    return { printCallback, testSize: 100 };
  },
  computed: {
    appbarHeight: function () {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case "xs":
          return String(this.$vuetify.breakpoint.width * 0.3473) + "px";
        case "sm":
          return String(this.$vuetify.breakpoint.width * 0.3773) + "px";
        case "lg":
          return String(this.$vuetify.breakpoint.width * 0.2973) + "px";
        default:
          return String(this.$vuetify.breakpoint.width * 0.3173) + "px";
      }
    }
  },
  mixins: [velocityMixin]
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
